scripts.arduino: arduino-cli compile arduino --build-property "build.extra_flags=-DJUG_ID=1 -DMQTT_USERNAME=\"$MQTT_USERNAME\" -DMQTT_PASSWORD=\"$MQTT_PASSWORD\"" && arduino-cli upload arduino && arduino-cli monitor -p /dev/ttyACM0
scripts.simulate-arduino: sudo $(which create_ap) wlp0s20f3 wlp0s20f3 jug_2 --freq-band 2.4 -g 192.168.4.1 --no-dnsmasq --daemon && sleep 5 && sudo dnsmasq --interface=ap0 --bind-interfaces --dhcp-range=192.168.4.2,192.168.4.255 -z -H hosts
scripts.hostspot: sudo $(which create_ap) wlp0s20f3 wlp0s20f3 islandwifi island01 --freq-band 2.4 -g 192.168.4.1 --no-dnsmasq --daemon && sleep 5 && sudo dnsmasq --interface=ap0 --bind-interfaces --dhcp-range=192.168.4.2,192.168.4.255 -z -H hosts
scripts.stop-hotspot: sudo pkill create_ap && sudo pkill dnsmasq
